subject: Implement Feature Flags System
description:
Create kill switches for operational control:
1. Create /home/ken/developer-portal/src/lib/features.ts
2. Add feature_flags table: name, enabled, scope (global/project/org), metadata
3. Implement checkFeature() helper
4. Create admin UI at /admin/feature-flags
5. Core flags: signups_enabled, provisioning_enabled, storage_enabled, realtime_enabled
6. Add caching for performance (TTL 60s)
7. Log all feature flag changes to audit log

This enables safe rollouts and incident response capabilities.
